Package otp1.otpr21fotosdemo

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp1.otpr21fotosdemo.Database
  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database class handles all connections and data transfers to and from the mySQL database.
    Author:
    Kalle Voutilainen, Petri Immonen, Jüri Tihane, Janne Kaukua

      • saltRegister

        public void saltRegister​(java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String passWord,
                         java.lang.String email1,
                         java.lang.String email2,
                         javafx.scene.text.Text loginErrorText)
        Used for adding a new user to database before creating a password hash.
        Parameters:
        userName - username for the user.
        passWord - plaintext password.
        email1 - email of the user.
        email2 - email of the user again.
        loginErrorText - reference to a JavaFX Text -element for displaying error message or other information.

      • saltLogin

        public java.lang.String saltLogin​(java.lang.String passWord)
        Creates a hash from plaintext password using hashPassword-method.
        Parameters:
        passWord - plaintext password
        Returns:
        hash generated from the password.

      • hashPassword

        public byte[] hashPassword​(char[] password,
                           byte[] salt,
                           int iterations,
                           int keyLength)
        Creates a hash from plaintext password.
        Parameters:
        password - plaintext password
        salt - salt.
        iterations - number of iterations.
        keyLength - key length
        Returns:
        hash generated from the password.

      • register

        public void register​(java.lang.String userName,
                     java.lang.String passWord,
                     java.lang.String email1,
                     java.lang.String email2,
                     javafx.scene.text.Text loginErrorText)
        Used for adding a new user to database after creating a password hash.
        Parameters:
        userName - username for the user.
        passWord - password hash for the user.
        email1 - email of the user.
        email2 - email of the user again.
        loginErrorText - reference to a JavaFX Text -element for displaying error message or other information.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • userAndPwExists

        public java.lang.Integer userAndPwExists​(java.lang.String user,
                                         java.lang.String passWord)
        Checks if username user exists with password passWord. If user and password match, also passes user information to controller with controllers fetchUserInfo-method.
        Parameters:
        user - username to be searched for.
        passWord - password for the user.
        Returns:
        returns the userID of the user if password was correct. If username and password combination was wrong or the user doesnt exist, returns 0.

      • changeUserPassword

        public boolean changeUserPassword​(int userID,
                                  java.lang.String newPassword)
        Changes the users password
        Parameters:
        userID - ID of the user in question
        newPassword - new password
        Returns:
        true if password was changed. False if not.

      • changeUserInfoDB

        public boolean changeUserInfoDB​(java.lang.String userSurname,
                                java.lang.String userFrontName,
                                java.lang.String userEmail,
                                int userID)
        Changes the users information in database.
        Parameters:
        userSurname - new surname for the user.
        userFrontName - new first name for the user.
        userEmail - new email for the user.
        userID - existing userID of the user.
        Returns:
        true if some information was changed. Otherwise false.

      • userExists

        public boolean userExists​(java.lang.String user)
        Checks if a user with a username of user exists
        Parameters:
        user - username of the user to be searched for.
        Returns:
        true if the username is found in the database.

      • imageExists

        public boolean imageExists​(int imageID)
        Checks if an image with the specified imageID exits.
        Parameters:
        imageID - imageID to be searched for.
        Returns:
        true if an image with imageID is found. Note: will return false if image-thumbnail with imageID is found but full resolution image is missing or vice versa.

        public boolean deleteAllUserImages​(int userID)
        Deletes all the images in database with userID of userID.
        Parameters:
        userID - users ID
        Returns:
        true if deletion was succesful.

        Parameters:
        userID - userID of the user to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if deletion was succesful.

      • deleteImage

        public boolean deleteImage​(int imageID)
        Deletes the image with specified imageID.
        Parameters:
        imageID - ID of the image to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if rows where deleted from database.

      • setImagePublicity

        public boolean setImagePublicity​(int imageID,
                                 boolean publc)
        Sets the publicity status of the image with specified imageID.
        Parameters:
        imageID - ID of the image in question.
        publc - publicity of the image. True being public and false being private.
        Returns:
        true if a row was changed in the database.

      • imageIsPublic

        public boolean imageIsPublic​(int imageID)
        Checks whether image is public or not
        Parameters:
        imageID - ID of the image in question.
        Returns:
        true if image is public and false if it is private.

      • getFileSize

        public float getFileSize​(java.io.File file)
        returns file size of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - file in question.
        Returns:
        file size in megabytes.

      • uploadImages

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> uploadImages​(int userId,
                                                      int folderId,
                                                      java.util.List<java.io.File> files)
        Uploads a list of files to database for given userID and folderID. This method creates a smaller thumbnail Image from original image and also extracts image information from the file and saves those to the Database. NOTE!: This method is time-consuming and should be only run in a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user in question.
        folderId - folder ID of the folder where the images are uploaded.
        files - List<File> containing imagefiles to be uploaded.
        Returns:
        ArrayList<Integer> of image ID:s (generated by the Database) that were uploaded.

      • downloadImages

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image>> downloadImages​(int folderId,
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String searchString,
                                                                                                                               java.time.LocalDate uploadDate)
        Downloads specified images from the Database. If no searchString and uploadDate are specified, all images in folder are returned.
        Parameters:
        folderId - ID of the folder where to search for the images.
        searchString - search-text to match against images filenames. (Optional. Use NULL if not used)
        uploadDate - upload date of the images to be selected. (Optional. Use NULL if not used)
        Returns:
        Map<Integer, Pair<String, javafx.scene.image.Image>> -structure where Map-key contains imageID. Map-value is ja Pair containing filename String and actual image data as javafx.scene.image.Image

      • downloadPublicImages

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image>> downloadPublicImages​(java.lang.String searchString,
                                                                                                                                     java.time.LocalDate uploadDate)
        Downloads public images from the Database. If no searchString and uploadDate are specified, all public images are returned.
        Parameters:
        searchString - search-text to match against images filenames. (Optional. Use NULL if not used)
        uploadDate - upload date of the images to be selected. (Optional. Use NULL if not used)
        Returns:
        Map<Integer, Pair<String, javafx.scene.image.Image>> -structure where Map-key contains imageID. Map-value is ja Pair containing filename String and actual image data as javafx.scene.image.Image

      • downloadFullImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image downloadFullImage​(int imageID)
        Downloads a full resolution image with specified image ID
        Parameters:
        imageID - ID of the image to be downloaded
        Returns:
        image date as javafx.scene.image.Image

      • getUserFolders

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getUserFolders​(int userId,
                                                                                  int parentfolderid)
        Returns users folders.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user in question.
        parentfolderid - folder ID of the current folder. 0 if root.
        Returns:
        HashMap<Integer, String> containing folder ID and folder name for each folder.

      • uploadNewFolder

        public void uploadNewFolder​(java.lang.String name,
                            int userId,
                            int parentfolderid)
        Uploads a new folder.
        Parameters:
        name - name for the folder.
        userId - ID of the current user.
        parentfolderid - folder ID of the root folder of current user.

      • deleteFolder

        public void deleteFolder​(int folderid)
        Deletes a folder. Also deletes all subfolders using deleteChildFolders-method.
        Parameters:
        folderid - ID of the folder to be deleted.

      • getRootFolderId

        public int getRootFolderId​(int userId)
        Returns the folder ID for users root folder.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user in question.
        Returns:
        folder ID of the users root folder.

      • changeUserLevel

        public void changeUserLevel​(int userId,
                            int newUserLevel)
        Changes the userlevel for specified user. Used for changing a free user to premium user of vice versa or setting admin status to user.
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user.
        newUserLevel - new user level. 1 being free user, 2 being premium user and 1000 being admin.

      • deleteChildFolders

        public void deleteChildFolders​(int parentfolderid)
        Deletes all subfolders of the specified folder.
        Parameters:
        parentfolderid - ID of the folder for which all subfolders will be deleted.

      • listUsers

        public java.util.ArrayList<FotosUser> listUsers()
        Returns an list of users and their user information. Used by adminview.
        Returns:
        ArrayList<FotosUser> containing all users in database.

      • countAdmins

        public int countAdmins()
        Returns the number of admins in database.
        Returns:
        number of admin users in database.
